header.description: The Cloud Foundry plug-in uses the Cloud Foundry command line (cf) utility to interact with applications in a target Cloud Foundry system.

step-type.name: Bind Service
step-type.description: This step binds a Cloud Foundry service instance onto a Cloud Foundry application.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example, http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization where the application will be deployed, for example: some-space

server:property-ui.label: Application Name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application to bind to the service.

server:property-ui.label: Service name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the service to be bound.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Create Domain
step-type.description: This step creates a domain in an organization.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example, http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space

server:property-ui.label: Domain
server:property-ui.description: Name of the domain owning the route.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Create Route
step-type.description: This step creates a URL route in a space.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example, http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Domain
server:property-ui.description: Name of the domain owning the route.

server:property-ui.label: Hostname
server:property-ui.description: The hostname within the domain for the URL route.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: CLI Version
server:property-ui.description: Specify 7 if using version cli 7 else leave blank.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Create or Update User-Provided Service
step-type.description: This step creates or updates a user-provided service instance.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example, http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: User-Provided Service
server:property-ui.description: The name of the user-provided service.

server:property-ui.label: Credentials
server:property-ui.description: Credentials, in JSON format, to be exposed in the VCAP_SERVICES environment variable for bound applications. A full file path may also be specified. Example: {"username":"admin", "password":"pa55woRD"} Windows users must escape each double quote with a backslash.

server:property-ui.label: Log Drain URL
server:property-ui.description: The URL to which logs for bound applications will be streamed.

server:property-ui.label: Route Service URL
server:property-ui.description: The URL to which requests for bound routes will be forwarded. Scheme for this URL must be https. Note: This feature was added in Cloud Foundry CLI v6.16.0.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Create Service
step-type.description: This setp creates a new Cloud Foundry Service.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Service name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the service.

server:property-ui.label: Service type
server:property-ui.description: The type of service.

server:property-ui.label: Service plan
server:property-ui.description: The service plan.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Create Subdomain
step-type.description: This step creates a subdomain in an organization.

property-ui.label: API
property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example: http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

property-ui.label: Organization
property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

property-ui.label: Space
property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

property-ui.label: Subdomain
property-ui.description: The name of the subdomain, as in: myapp of myapp.domain.org.

property-ui.label: Domain
property-ui.description: The name of the domain, as in: domain.org of subdomain myapp.domain.org.

property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Delete App
step-type.description: This step deletes an application.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A url of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example: http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Application name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application.

server:property-ui.label: Delete mapped routes
server:property-ui.description: Also delete any mapped routes.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

step-type.name: Execute CF Script
step-type.description: This step executes a cf script. The context will be set up with the authenticated user and target space.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example: http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Script
server:property-ui.description: Each command needs to be on a new line.

server:property-ui.label: Arguments
server:property-ui.description: These are the arguments to be passed to the script, separated by spaces.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Execute CF bash file
step-type.description: This step executes a bash file. The context will be set up with the authenticated user and target space. The sh command must be available from the command line.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example: http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Script
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf.bash file.

server:property-ui.label: Arguments
server:property-ui.description: These are the arguments to be passed to the script, separated by spaces.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Map Route
step-type.description: This step adds a URL route to an application.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example: http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Application name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application.

server:property-ui.label: Domain
server:property-ui.description: The domain to use, as in: example.com.

server:property-ui.label: Hostname
server:property-ui.description: The hostname within the domain for the url route.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Push Application
step-type.description: This step pushes the application with or without a manifest file. If a manifest file is found, then properties are used as overrides.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, for example: http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Application Name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application to use when deployed. Application Name is required, if not using a manifest.

server:property-ui.label: Application Path
server:property-ui.description: The name of zip file or other file to push. If this file isn't in your working directory, you must specify a full file path. (Otherwise just the name of the file e.g. 'myApp.zip')

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Manifest file
server:property-ui.description: The name of the manifest file. If this file isn't in your working directory, you must specify a full file path. (Otherwise, just specify the name of the file, for example: 'manifest.xml')

server:property-ui.label: Domain
server:property-ui.description: Set a custom domain to be used when deploying the application.

server:property-ui.label: Sub-domain
server:property-ui.description: Define a subdomain for your application. This is useful to ensure that the URL route for the application is unique within the domain.

server:property-ui.label: Number of instances
server:property-ui.description: The number of instances of the application that will be created.

server:property-ui.label: Memory limit
server:property-ui.description: The memory limit, for example: 256M, 1024M, 1G.

server:property-ui.label: Disk limit
server:property-ui.description: The disk limit, for example: 256M, 1024M, 1G.

server:property-ui.label: Custom buildpack
server:property-ui.description: The name of the custom buildpack, for example: my-buildpack, or the Git URL, for example: https://github.com/heroku/heroku-buildpack-play.git).

server:property-ui.label: Stack
server:property-ui.description: The stack to use (a stack is a prebuilt file system, including an operating system, that can run applications).

server:property-ui.label: Timeout
server:property-ui.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for application start. Other server side timeouts may apply.

server:property-ui.label: No start
server:property-ui.description: Does not start the application, if selected.

server:property-ui.label: No route
server:property-ui.description: Does not create a URL route for the application, if selected. Manually create and map a route later.

server:property-ui.label: No manifest
server:property-ui.description: Ignore the manifest file, if one exists.

server:property-ui.label: No hostname
server:property-ui.description: Map the root domain to this application.

server:property-ui.label: Random route
server:property-ui.description: Create a random route for this application.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: CLI Version
server:property-ui.description: Specify 7 if using version cli 7 else leave blank.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.name: Restart App
step-type.description: This step restarts an application.

server:property-ui.label: API
server:property-ui.description: A URL of the target Cloud Foundry system, sfor example: http://api.ng.bluemix.net.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry User
server:property-ui.description: The user name of the account that will interact with Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with the Cloud Foundry system. Property is required, unless authenticated outside of UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed, for example: some-space.

server:property-ui.label: Application name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

property-ui.label: CF_HOME
property-ui.description: Set the CF_HOME variable to explicitly define the location of the config.json file. A new CF_HOME will be used for each step, if not specified.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Use Shell Interpreter
property-ui.description: Use a shell to interpret cf commands. This provides backward compatibility with the community plug-in, but does not escape special characters.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables
property-ui.description: Set environment variables using the following syntax: name=value. Separate each pair with a new line or comma.

step-type.description: This step starts an application.

server:property-ui.label: Application name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application.

server:property-ui.label: Domain
server:property-ui.description: The domain to use, as in: example.com.

server:property-ui.label: Hostname
server:property-ui.description: The hostname within the domain for the URL route.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation

server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

property-ui.label: Environment Variables

step-type.name: CF Auto-Configure
step-type.description: This step discovers and configures all organizations and spaces for each organization into a resource tree in UrbanCode Deploy.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry API
server:property-ui.description: The URL of the Cloud Foundry API endpoint.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: The path to the cf command line script.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Username
server:property-ui.description: The username to authenticate with the Cloud Foundry server.

server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password to authenticate with the Cloud Foundry server.

server:property-ui.label: Resource
server:property-ui.description: The Resource being configured.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will not be performed.

step-type.name: CF Discovery
step-type.description: This step will discover if Cloud Foundry is on an agent, by checking common installation paths. If Cloud Foundry is on the agent, UrbanCode Deploy will assign the role to the resource and set the command path property.

server:property-ui.label: Resource
server:property-ui.description: The Resource being configured.

server:property-ui.label: Override CF CLI Path
server:property-ui.description: Provide the full path to the cf executable file to override the auto discovery path.

server:property-ui.label: CF_HOME Directory
server:property-ui.description: Full path to your CF_HOME directory for installation verification. Not required if the property is a system environment variable.

server:property-ui.label: API Endpoint
server:property-ui.description: Provide the API endpoint if the config.json file does not exist or is not configured correctly on the agent to be used during discovery.

server:property-group.name: CloudFoundryController
server:property-group.server:description: The role for resources that represents a Cloud Controller in a Cloud Foundry instance.

server:property-ui.label: cf.api
server:property-ui.description: The URL of the Cloud Foundry API endpoint.

server:property-ui.label: cf.commandPath
server:property-ui.description: The path to the directory where the cf command line executable resides. You may reference this property as 'cf.commandPath'.

server:property-ui.label: cf.username
server:property-ui.description: The Cloud Foundry username.

server:property-ui.label: cf.password
server:property-ui.description: The Cloud Foundry password to use.

server:property-group.name: CloudFoundryOrganization
server:property-group.server:description: The role for resources that represents a Cloud Foundry organization in a Cloud Foundry instance.

server:property-ui.label: cf.org
server:property-ui.description: The Name of the Cloud Foundry organization.

server:property-group.name: CloudFoundrySpace
server:property-group.server:description: The role for resources that represents a Cloud Foundry space within an organization in a Cloud Foundry instance.

server:property-ui.label: cf.space
server:property-ui.description: The Name of the Cloud Foundry space.

server:property-group.name: CloudFoundryApp
server:property-group.server:description: The role for resources that represents a Cloud Foundry application within an organization and space in a Cloud Foundry instance.

server:property-ui.label: cf.app
server:property-ui.description: The Name of the Cloud Foundry application.
